attributes.additional_details:
Michael Gove wants our children to work 10 hour days. This is unacceptable for both the children, parents and teachers.

Children would be working a longer day than adults, Clubs would go unattended and thus go out of business, parents would not see their children and teachers would have to put in several extra hours each day.

This should not be allowed to happen as it will break down the family unit.
